elements.title: Adoration of the Magi
elements.contents: ... that the horses in Signorelli's Adoration of the Magi (pictured) have been said to be "badly-drawn ... with curious mannerisms of too closely-placed nostrils, and human eyebrows"?

elements.title: Navidades
elements.contents: ... that Navidades by Luis Miguel was the first Spanish-language album to enter the Billboard Top Holiday Albums since 1966?

elements.title: Christmas Raid
elements.contents: ... that the Christmas Raid carried out by Confederate brigadier general John Hunt Morgan captured 1,800 Union soldiers?

elements.title: Justin Bieber's version
elements.contents: ... that critics were confused by Justin Bieber's version of "Drummer Boy", in which he raps about himself and consumer products, which was seen to bastardize the original sentiment?

elements.title: The Littlest Angel
elements.contents: ... that the classic children's Christmas story The Littlest Angel was written in just three days?

elements.title: their red holiday cups
elements.contents: ... that Starbucks raised money for HIV/AIDS research using their red holiday cups?

elements.title: Vom Himmel hoch
elements.contents: ... that Mendelssohn's 1831 Christmas cantata Vom Himmel hoch, influenced by Bach's chorale cantatas, was based on a 1539 carol composed by Martin Luther?

elements.title: Santa Claus
elements.contents: ... that Santa Claus really did on one occasion deliver coal?
